page.title: 14Charlie
page.content: Everybody who comes to Cairndow knows Charlie.He is a five year old golden labrodor who lives at the hotel. Sometimes instead of being taken for a walk Charlie takes the people for a walk. He shows them round the pinetum and shows them the dam.If you clap him he will come over and sit beside you but when he gets bored he would go away with someone else.He is not always good sometimes he bites car wheels and he always jumps into other peoples cars and goes to sleep in them tut tut tut.There is a lady who gets bones for her dogs delivered to her and he steals most of them.Except for all of the bad things he does we all really like charlie.
